basics.name: N.W. Gayan Virajith
basics.title: Software Engineer
basics.summary: "Gayan will always prioritize his work. His coding is impeccable and efficient. If something needs to be researched, he will do it and come up with a solution. He performs like a diesel: once he starts, he'll keep going until the work is completed." - Martin T., CEO Mearch B.V.
basics.keywords: PHP, Ruby on rails, Java, Node JS, Html5, Css3, Javascript, JQuery, Angular, Jekyll, Sass, Less, Gulp, Symfony, Codeigniter, Javascript, Zend, Spring, Hibernate, Ruby on rails 2.3.5, 3.0, ProcessWire CMS/CMF, Apache, Apache Tomcat, Javascript, Jetty, Jekyll, OOD (UML, Design Patterns), MySQL, Oracle, Oracle, MongoDB, SQLite, Eclipse, NetBeans, PhpStorm, RubyMine, IntellijIDEA, Sublime, XCode 5.5, Git, SVN, Unix based system (Fedora, Cent) and Mac OS

highlights: Involved developing highly optimized web solutions in order to get maximum speed when it comes to rendering
Trained and lead technical and support team.
Doing technical research & developments and applying knowledge when as possible.
Mainly involved for making User friendly, Cross browser compatible, Responsive websites without relying on any CSS frameworks.
Implementing various kind of software applications for the web platform.
Mainly involved developing web application using PHP and Ruby on rails.
Responsible for lead the team to achieve deadlines.
Conducted training for web application developments.
Had direct contact with clients when necessary in order to make the product in client oriented manner.
Research & Developments on web technologies and applied those knowledge to real-time projects.
Coordinate & Involved real-time projects going in hSenid Outsourcing.
Lecturer,  Certificate course in Java programming.
Technical problem solving and motivating students as for their future plans.

education.institution: University of Dublin conducted by National Institute of Business Management (NIBM)

distinctions.description: Higher Diploma in Computer Based Information Systems, NIBM, Sri Lanka
Diploma in Computer System Design, NIBM, Sri Lanka
CELV Certificate conducted by NAITA, Sri Lanka
